00039 #include <QPoint>
00040 
00041 #include "DifferentialGeometry.h"
00042 #include "ParallelRandomDeviate.h"
00043 #include "Ray.h"
00044 #include "RayTracerNoTr.h"
00045 #include "RayTracerPhoton.h"

00050 
00051 RayTracerNoTr::RayTracerNoTr( InstanceNode* rootNode,
00052                InstanceNode* lightNode,
00053                TLightShape* lightShape,
00054                TSunShape* const lightSunShape,
00055                Transform lightToWorld,
00056                RandomDeviate& rand,
00057                QMutex* mutex,
00058                TPhotonMap* photonMap )
00059 :m_rootNode( rootNode ),
00060 m_lightNode( lightNode ),
00061 m_lightShape( lightShape ),
00062 m_lightSunShape( lightSunShape ),
00063 m_lightToWorld( lightToWorld ),
00064 m_pRand( &rand ),
00065 m_mutex( mutex ),
00066 m_photonMap( photonMap )
00067 {
00068         m_validAreasVector = m_lightShape->GetValidAreasCoord();
00069 }
00070 
00071 //generating the ray
00072 bool RayTracerNoTr::NewPrimitiveRay( Ray* ray, ParallelRandomDeviate& rand )
00073 {
00074         int area = int ( rand.RandomDouble() * m_validAreasVector.size() );
00075         QPair< int, int > areaIndex = m_validAreasVector[area] ;
00076 
00077         //generating the photon
00078         Point3D origin = m_lightShape->Sample( rand.RandomDouble(), rand.RandomDouble(), areaIndex.first, areaIndex.second );
00079         //generating the ray direction
00080         Vector3D direction;
00081         m_lightSunShape->GenerateRayDirection( direction, rand );
00082         //generatin the ray
00083         *ray =  m_lightToWorld( Ray( origin, direction ) );
00084 
00085         return true;
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 QPair< TPhotonMap*, std::vector< RayTracerPhoton > > RayTracerNoTr::operator()( double numberOfRays )
00090 {
00091         std::vector< RayTracerPhoton > photonsVector;
00092         ParallelRandomDeviate rand( m_pRand, m_mutex );
00093 
00094         for(  unsigned long  i = 0; i < numberOfRays; ++i )
00095         {
00096                 std::vector<Ray> currentRaysWay;
00097                 Ray ray;
00098                 if( NewPrimitiveRay( &ray, rand ) )
00099                 {
00100                         photonsVector.push_back( RayTracerPhoton( ray.origin, 1, 0, m_lightNode ) );
00101                         int rayLength = 0;
00102 
00103                         InstanceNode* intersectedSurface = 0;
00104                         bool isFront = false;
00105                         bool isDirectSun = true;
00106 
00107                         //Trace the ray
00108                         bool isReflectedRay = true;
00109                         while( isReflectedRay )
00110                         {
00111                                 intersectedSurface = 0;
00112                                 isFront = 0;
00113                                 Ray reflectedRay;
00114                                 isReflectedRay = m_rootNode->Intersect( ray, rand, &isFront, &intersectedSurface, &reflectedRay );
00115 
00116                                 if (!isDirectSun) currentRaysWay.push_back(ray);
00117                                 if( isReflectedRay )
00118                                 {
00119                                         photonsVector.push_back( RayTracerPhoton( (ray)( ray.maxt ), isFront, ++rayLength, intersectedSurface) );
00120 
00121                                         //Prepare node and ray for next iteration
00122                                         ray = reflectedRay;
00123                                         isDirectSun = false;
00124                                 }
00125 
00126                         }
00127 
00128                         if( !(rayLength == 0 && ray.maxt == HUGE_VAL) )
00129                         {
00130                                 if( ray.maxt == HUGE_VAL  )
00131                                 {
00132                                         ray.maxt = 0.1;
00133                                         photonsVector.push_back( RayTracerPhoton( (ray)( ray.maxt ), 0, ++rayLength, intersectedSurface) );
00134                                 }
00135                                 else
00136                                         photonsVector.push_back( RayTracerPhoton( (ray)( ray.maxt ), isFront, ++rayLength, intersectedSurface) );
00137                         }
00138                         if (currentRaysWay.size()>0)
00139                         {
00140                                 currentRaysWay.resize(currentRaysWay.size());
00141                                 m_rootNode->Analyze(&currentRaysWay,m_mutex);
00142                                 currentRaysWay.clear();
00143                         }
00144 
00145                 }
00146 
00147         }
00148         photonsVector.resize( photonsVector.size() );
00149 
00150         return QPair< TPhotonMap*, std::vector< RayTracerPhoton > >( m_photonMap, photonsVector );
00151
